metadata.title: CVE-2019-7152 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered in wasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::processFunctions() in wasm/wasm-binary.cpp (when calling wasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::getFunctionIndexName) in Binaryen 1.38.22. A crafted input can cause segmentation faults, leading to denial-of-service, as demonstrated by wasm-opt.

criterions.comment: binaryen package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
